title: Norfside Navy on Growing Up Asian in Inglewood, Getting Shot 12 Times & More
description:
Norfside Navy talks about family dynamic, street life, trying to avoid the stress of it, aiming todo better for the next generation and more.

---
00:00 Intro
5:57 - Thrizzle and PB being brothers, growing up together, Thrizzle being adopted by PB’s parents 
9:28 - Thrizzle had been through a lot and was in the streets at 16, PB on getting put on 
14:23 - PB on gravitating towards gangsta rap and clique music, Thrizzle not picking up any of the cooking skills from PB’s mom 
17:25 - Thrizzle not wanting to rap at first, coming up with the name Norf Side Navy, getting locked up as a asian 
23:15 - Thrizzle being sh_t 12 times, still having a bullet stuck between his heart, lung and artery
26:16 - Thrizzle having surgery taking the chance of being paralyzed from the neck down  
34:18 - Working in the studio together, Thrizzle being the fastest writer, the music being like therapy 
36:34 - Musical influences Ice Cube, DJ Quik, Suga Free 
38:49 - How to deal with people starting internet beef
40:34 - Thoughts on Quando Rondo or anyone else dropping their flag, rock with who rocks with you
45:08 - Working on new music, having tapes done already, having more than 200 songs 
48:11 - PB congratulating T-Rell on his success in the media space, showing kids everybody doesn’t have to be a rapper 
58:35 - Thrizzle on going on the run in Miami, meeting Trick daddy, his love for BG 
1:01:53 - The street life becoming stressful after so long, being out of state and people not knowing or caring about the street side 
1:06:56 - PB’s motivation being his kids, having them young, avoiding prison, loyalty and trust being big, the goal being to get home 
1:09:51 - Never hanging the flag up, Quando Rondo was clout chasing and paid his way, the LA gang sh*t being real life 
1:11:51 - Rapper having to tap in when they come to LA 
1:22:13 - Young Thug being told on, “he was weird but he did sh*t” 

---

---

00:00 Intro

5:57 - Thrizzle and PB being brothers, growing up together, Thrizzle being adopted by PB’s parents 

9:28 - Thrizzle had been through a lot and was in the streets at 16, PB on getting put on 

14:23 - PB on gravitating towards gangsta rap and clique music, Thrizzle not picking up any of the cooking skills from PB’s mom
